name: Corporate Helicopters - Flight Training Academy
about: Corporate Helicopters Flight Training Academy, located in San Diego, California, is an FAA-approved helicopter flight school dedicated to training the next generation of elite helicopter pilots. Founded in 1990 by Deann and Ivor Shier, the academy is part of Shier Aviation, which offers a range of helicopter services including charters, tours, aerial filming, and maintenance. The academy focuses solely on helicopter pilot training, offering private and commercial licenses, as well as add-on certifications for existing commercial airline pilots. With a commitment to safety and high-quality instruction, the academy utilizes advanced helicopters such as the Robinson R22 and R44, ensuring students receive comprehensive and professional training to achieve their career goals. Led by Chief Pilot Gary and supported by Administrator Ally, the academy provides personalized attention and guidance to each student, ensuring they become exceptional career pilots.
